com.google.enterprise.connector.spi

Class DocumentAccessException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.google.enterprise.connector.spi.RepositoryException
          • com.google.enterprise.connector.spi.RepositoryDocumentException
            • com.google.enterprise.connector.spi.DocumentAccessException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DocumentAccessException
extends RepositoryDocumentException
    Thrown in cases where the search or traversal user does not have enough privileges to access a document.

    It is the responsibility of the Connector to construct a checkpoint that skips over the offending Document if DocumentList.checkpoint() is called after this exception is thrown.

    Since:
    3.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
